shut-lions-mouths.hebrew: אֱלָהִי שְׁלַח מַלְאֲכֵהּ וּסֲגַר פֻּם אַרְיָוָתָא
shut-lions-mouths.english: My God sent His angel and shut the lions' mouths

god-reveals-mysteries.english: There is a God in heaven who reveals mysteries

mene-mene.context: Reading the writing on the wall
mene-mene.english: MENE, MENE, TEKEL, UPHARSIN - You have been weighed and found wanting

not-defile-himself.hebrew: וַיָּשֶׂם דָּנִיֵּאל עַל לִבּוֹ אֲשֶׁר לֹא יִתְגָּאַל
not-defile-himself.english: Daniel resolved that he would not defile himself

three-times-daily.hebrew: וְזִמְנִין תְּלָתָא בְּיוֹמָא הוּא בָּרֵךְ עַל בִּרְכוֹהִי
three-times-daily.english: Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed

vision-of-night.english: I saw in my vision by night

god-we-serve.context: His three friends before the furnace
god-we-serve.hebrew: אֱלָהֲנָא דִּי אֲנַחְנָא פָלְחִין יָכִל לְשֵׁיזָבוּתַנָא
god-we-serve.english: The God we serve is able to deliver us... But even if He does not
